modName: Inns and Guilds Have More Visitors
summary: This mod aims to add more life to Skyrim! New NPC\'s are added to many of the game\'s inns and guilds. One unique follower as well as generic NPC\'s are included in each. I will add new features as I learn them.
descriptionHtml:
Newly Cleaned with TES5Edit, updated to 1.8, and grey face fix!

Description
----------------
Have you ever wanted to see more life in your favorite guild or travelers in your favorite inn? The wait is over! This mod comes complete with files to add more NPC\'s and followers to the various inns and guilds. New places are being uploaded all the time, so keep an eye out! Some of my first mods with the CK, so constructive criticism is appreciated. Thanks!

P.S. Remember to endorse if you like it! Also, pictures of you favorite followers in action are appreciated as well!

Note: Followers have been added, as well as marriage capability. Every added follower does have this option but it has not been tested. They have the dialogue, so it should work. I am currently working on updating and creating new NPC\'s and they will be uploaded soon. Each inn or guild will have one unique named follower, and a few generic NPC\'s as well. Also note that the Blades file should be installed after having found Sky Haven Temple, as it they will be in there no matter when you visit.

Current Features
------------------------
-Follower capability.
-Named followers.
-Generic NPC\'s.
-Marriage.
-Improved inventories.

Current Places
---------------------
-Windpeak Inn, in Dawnstar (Mythic Dawn Visitors)
-Dead Man\'s Drink, in Falkreath (Falkreath Visitors)
-Skyhaven Temple (Blades Visitors)
-Jorrvaskr, in Whiterun (Companions Visitors)
-The Ragged Flagon, in Riften (Thieves Guild Visitors)
-The Frozen Hearth, in Winterhold (Mage\'s College Visitors 1)

Bugs
------
None known so far in the newest version.

Please report any and all bugs to me over comments or PM\'s.

Installation
---------------
Simply download the ESP\'s of your choice and place them into the \"C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\" (without quotes) or your corresponding folder.

Uninstallation
-------------------
Simply delete the ESP\'s from your \"C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\" (without quotes) or your corresponding folder.

In The Works
------------------
Mages in the Winterhold Inn and Mage College
More DB Members in the Dawnstar Sanctuary
Visitors/Adventurers/Others in other inns

Feel free to suggest more in the comments or by PM.

Planned Features
------------------------
-Scheduling
-Hirelings

Incompatibilities
-----------------------
-Belua Sanguinare: This mod only slightly conflicts, and some added NPC\'s may be fed on twice when feeding as a BS vampire. I personally use this mod and my own, and it is only a minor issue.
Credits
----------
Bethesda- For the Creation Kit and Skyrim.
The Nexus Community- For being generous and helpful.
Latteraliss- Who\'s tutorials started me modding in the first place.
RileyWulf- For character concepts as well as many other suggestions.
Me- For making the ESP\'s and coming up with the concept.

Other Mods
-----------------
Knights of Red Watch Saves- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4169
These Mods Via Steam Workshop- 
http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561197970429960/myworkshopfiles/
Fork of Horripilation Quest- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17187
Soul Food- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18951/

Similar (and Compatible) Mods
------------------------------------------
More Useful People, by Tolkar
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9298
Populated Cities, by Pandazooka
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9201
Crowded Cities, by Velvokay
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9117
Populus, by Adjie
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8955

Thanks!
author: Rifli

files.name: Thieves Guild Visitors V1-3
files.changelogHtml:
Added Tangelina Palek and five Thieves\' Guild Initiates to the Ragged Flagon and Thieves\' Guild.
More to come...

files.name: Blades Temple Visitors V1-3-1
files.changelogHtml:
Updated Blades\' file to include Azadio and 2 generic Blades Initiates as well as a generic mage/scholar Blades Initiate.
More to come...

files.name: Follower Test Pack
files.changelogHtml:
Added an optional Follower Test Pack.
The Test pack includes three fully functional and scheduled followers to DarkWater Crossing.
Added new, updated Companions File.
Includes 7 new NPC\'s. 6 are generic initiates.
The 7th is a Breton warrior (2-handed) named Declan Kinghart.

files.name: Companions Visitors V1-3-3
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed Declan\'s dissappearences.
Changed armor of the Intiates to be more immersion-friendly.
Changed placement of some of the added NPC\'s.

files.name: Mythic Dawn Visitors V1-3-4
files.changelogHtml:
Added the Mythic Dawn Visitors file.
Adds 5 new NPC\'s to the Windpeak Inn in Dawnstar.
Sylvestra Highwind, a breton conjurer follower.
4 generic Mythic Dawn cultists.

files.name: Falkreath Visitors V1-3-5
files.changelogHtml:
Added Falkreath Visitors file.
Includes 7 new NPC\'s.

files.name: Visitors Pack
files.changelogHtml:
Added Falkreath Visitors file.
Includes 7 new NPC\'s.

files.name: Mages College Visitors 1 V1-3-6
files.changelogHtml:
Added Mage\'s College Visitors 1 File (Part 2 coming soon!).
Adds 6 new NPC\'s to the Frozen Hearth Inn in Winterhold.
Adds Aurelia Secundas, a High Elf Spellsword Follower.
Adds 3 Generic Novice Mages.
Adds 2 Generic Adept Mages.
